name: Skull
purpose: Protects the brain and forms the structure of the face

name: Humerus
purpose: Supports arm movement and connects to the shoulder

name: Femur
purpose: Longest and strongest bone; supports upright posture

name: Rib Cage
purpose: Protects lungs, heart, and other chest organs

name: Vertebral Column
purpose: Supports the body and protects the spinal cord
